title: Unable to connect to the login queue after latest Windows 10 Update
body:
Unable to login, "Unable to connect to the login queue," 

This only popped up after the latest Windows 10 Update last night...

replies.body: Are you guys still having this issue?  There might have been a routing issue overnight for a few players closer to the west coast.  It looks like everything is okay now, though.
I am still having this issue. I played league this morning (popped off on veigar if i might add), but once i got the new windows 10 update i couldn't connect to the login queue. Plz help.
Same, does anyone know how to uninstall it?
